title: IS_RAW_KEY_PRESSED
content:
0x69F7C29E// IsRawKeyPressed
BOOL IS_RAW_KEY_PRESSED(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of pressed state.Gets if the specified rawKeyIndex is pressed on the keyboard.This will not be triggered if the key is disabled with DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAMEVirtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Luaif IsRawKeyPressed(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar pressed")
end
